attributes.action: Change the way history is taught in schools and include all races history.
attributes.additional_details:
Our education system needs updating.
To help the future generations understand each races history and bring about compassion and understanding in our children of the future.
History Education should cover Black, Asian and White peoples struggles and tribulations and should tell The good, the bad and the ugly of all history without fear of offending.
Only then will our children have understanding and compassion without bias views.
attributes.background: We the people would like our children’s history and religious education lessons to change as of today. To include relevant learning of all Races and religions in our schools.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Add education on diversity and racism to all school curriculums: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323808 

Making the UK education curriculum more inclusive of BAME history: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323961 

Teach Britain's colonial past as part of the UK's compulsory curriculum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324092 

Introduce Gender and Race equity for GCSE English Literature set texts: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324934
